revised_title: Investigating the Chemical Reactions and Storage Capacity of Storage Batteries
tldr: The author investigates the chemical reactions occurring during the charging and discharging of storage batteries, specifically focusing on the role of lead sulphate and the electrolysis of hexabasic sulphuric acid. The study provides a method to estimate the charge in a storage cell without discharging it, contributing to a better understanding of storage battery performance and capacity.
